node.title: Professor awarded $400,000 after being disciplined over wrong pronouns
node.description: Nick Meriwether responded to the student during classes by saying, "Yes, sir." The student asked him after class to use she/her pronouns when addressing her, but Meriwether said no.

node.title: Man arrested in fatal school stabbing police say was random attack
node.description: The attacker was able to come through a campus gate and attacked before security and staff could stop him, officials said.

node.title: Safety sensors on seat of teen killed on thrill ride were manually adjusted in "unsafe" way

node.title: "Happy Face Killer" victim identified almost 30 years after slaying

node.title: Brother of youngest Boston Marathon bombings victim finishes his first

node.title: 'I expect that it will be rising': Robertson on new inflation figure

node.title: Mother with breast cancer says Omicron surgery delays frightening, lonely
